name: Machel Montano
description: '''Machel Montano''' (born 24 November 1974) is a [[Trinidad and Tobago|Trinidadian and Tobagonian]] singer, songwriter and record producer. He is widely regarded for globalising and pioneering the [[Soca music]] genre. Known for his high-energy, fast-paced, and often unpredictable performances, Montano is one of Trinidad and Tobagoâ€™s most popular musicians.
